heading: making all music net music
subheading: a day after its acquisition, diamond multimedia unveils a spin-off company, a new portable player, and a grand plan to woo major record labels onto the net. by chris oakes.
author: chris oakes
text: a newly minted division of diamond multimedia wants to bring mainstream music into the internet mainstream. a day after it was purchased by electronics manufacturer s3, the company unveiled its magic formula for bringing the major record labels into the digital fold.diamond multimedia will spin off a new company called rioport and run it as a wholly owned subsidiary.read wired news' ongoing mp3 coverage
